name: RGBY (itch)
description:
A short puzzle game made for the Ludum Dare game jam.
Use colorful cubes to change your environment and get to the end.

Constrols
WASD - Strafe
Mouse - Look
Left MB - pickup/throw
Right MB - pickup/drop

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

================================
FOR WINDOWS USERS
================================
If the game isn't launching,
move the executable outside of the
game data folder and then launch it.
================================
